payload.content: Claude Cowork is a new feature within the Claude Desktop app that grants AI direct access to a user's files and folders, enabling task execution without terminal commands or code.

name: Claude Cowork is a new feature within the Claude Desktop app that grants AI dire
content: Claude Cowork is a new feature within the Claude Desktop app that grants AI direct access to a user's files and folders, enabling task execution without terminal commands or code.

payload.content: Users can leverage Claude Cowork by describing desired tasks and allowing the AI to autonomously complete the work.

name: Users can leverage Claude Cowork by describing desired tasks and allowing the AI
content: Users can leverage Claude Cowork by describing desired tasks and allowing the AI to autonomously complete the work.

payload.content: Claude Cowork can perform diverse business tasks, including organizing files, editing podcast videos into short-form clips, analyzing transcript themes and content gaps, conducting brand voice reviews of email marketing, and building productivity dashboards connected to Gmail, Google Calendar, and Notion.

name: Claude Cowork can perform diverse business tasks, including organizing files, ed
content: Claude Cowork can perform diverse business tasks, including organizing files, editing podcast videos into short-form clips, analyzing transcript themes and content gaps, conducting brand voice reviews of email marketing, and building productivity dashboards connected to Gmail, Google Calendar, and Notion.

payload.content: Using Claude Cowork for multiple business tasks can replace the need for five separate applications and hours of manual work.

name: Using Claude Cowork for multiple business tasks can replace the need for five se
content: Using Claude Cowork for multiple business tasks can replace the need for five separate applications and hours of manual work.
